name: part_008
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei  2nd solo live ＂Shout in Crisis＂ [USmUfG_-Sn8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Interlude between songs with audience cheering.
Medley introduction video featuring previous costumes and text highlights.
Performance of the song 'Je t'aime' as part of a medley.
Performance of 'Get on the Star' and a medley mashup of previous songs.
scenes.song_name: Medley (Get on the Star / Newton / Je t'aime)

subtitles.original: 僕の逃げ場の
subtitles.english: My place of refuge

subtitles.original: 輪郭さえぼやけそうな夜も
subtitles.english: In nights where even the outlines seem to blur

subtitles.original: 僕の全部取り返さなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I have to take back everything of mine

subtitles.original: 何度剥ぎ取ったって
subtitles.english: No matter how many times it's torn away

subtitles.original: 煩いくらいになるのいつか
subtitles.english: It'll become loud enough to be annoying someday

subtitles.original: 突き放そうとしたって
subtitles.english: Even if I tried to push it away

subtitles.original: 泥臭いのにしがみついて
subtitles.english: I'd cling to it, even if it's unsightly

subtitles.original: もう僕は売らない
subtitles.english: I won't sell myself out anymore

subtitles.original: この街の事情
subtitles.english: To the circumstances of this city

subtitles.original: リソースは全部自分を
subtitles.english: All my resources, for myself

subtitles.original: 大きくはしない
subtitles.english: I won't make them bigger

subtitles.original: 僕のこの罪も
subtitles.english: This sin of mine

subtitles.original: 姿、形も
subtitles.english: My appearance and form

subtitles.original: 誰に決められることもなく
subtitles.english: Without anyone deciding them for me

subtitles.original: そっと僕にとって
subtitles.english: Softly, to me

subtitles.original: 世界なんてどうだっていい
subtitles.english: The world doesn't matter at all

subtitles.original: この全部が確か
subtitles.english: All of this is certainly

subtitles.original: 間違いだって自分で決めるから
subtitles.english: Even if it's a mistake, because I'll decide it for myself

subtitles.original: あの愛おしさの
subtitles.english: That precious

subtitles.original: 輝きにも
subtitles.english: Brightness too

subtitles.original: 僕が蔓延る
subtitles.english: I will spread out

subtitles.original: 虚勢にも
subtitles.english: And in my bluffing

subtitles.original: 届かなくたって構わない
subtitles.english: I don't care if I don't reach

subtitles.original: 僕以外何もいらない！
subtitles.english: I don't need anything but myself!

subtitles.original: Finally, it's started.
subtitles.english: Finally, it's started.

subtitles.original: I think with 20 costumes for tonight...
subtitles.english: I think with 20 costumes for tonight...

subtitles.original: When you fell out of space...
subtitles.english: When you fell out of space...

subtitles.original: Final songs for us together.
subtitles.english: Final songs for us together.

subtitles.original: And this song is for everyone...
subtitles.english: And this song is for everyone...

subtitles.original: Called The Debut of the Year 2018.
subtitles.english: Called The Debut of the Year 2018.

subtitles.original: Just for show, just for show...
subtitles.english: Just for show, just for show...

subtitles.original: ゼロとイチで
subtitles.english: With zeros and ones

subtitles.original: 完成した目に合わす
subtitles.english: Matching eyes that have been completed

subtitles.original: 誰にも見せないままで
subtitles.english: While showing no one

subtitles.original: Just for show, just for show...
subtitles.english: Just for show, just for show...

subtitles.original: 鮮明なほどギャップ濁らせて
subtitles.english: Making the gap cloudier the clearer it gets

subtitles.original: 歌い出すわ
subtitles.english: I'll start singing

subtitles.original: In case I don't see you
subtitles.english: In case I don't see you

subtitles.original: ために目に焼き付けてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll burn it into my eyes for you

subtitles.original: Loose
subtitles.english: Loose

subtitles.original: 不相応でいけるわ
subtitles.english: I can go even if it's ill-suited

subtitles.original: 無邪気なほど解像度急行
subtitles.english: Resolution rushing like innocence

subtitles.original: 消失するものされるもの
subtitles.english: Things that vanish, things that are vanished

subtitles.original: 美しく全部壊しちゃえ
subtitles.english: Break it all beautifully

subtitles.original: 腹括ってぶち込め
subtitles.english: Steeling myself and plunging in

subtitles.original: Ten, one, start!
subtitles.english: Ten, one, start!

subtitles.original: 気触れてる不感症にも
subtitles.english: To those tainted by insensitivity

subtitles.original: 笑ってあげる
subtitles.english: I'll laugh for you

subtitles.original: 強がりじゃないよだってあなたとほら
subtitles.english: It's not a bluff, because look, with you

subtitles.original: トゥルルル...
subtitles.english: Turururu...

subtitles.original: 強制リロード待って間違った
subtitles.english: Wait, forced reload, I made a mistake

subtitles.original: 嘘じゃない
subtitles.english: It's not a lie

subtitles.original: あれもこれも全部愛と言い放とう
subtitles.english: Let's declare that everything is love

subtitles.original: 彗星のごとく現れたスターの原石
subtitles.english: A star in the making, appearing like a comet

subtitles.original: アイドルVTuberの星街すいせいでーす！
subtitles.english: Idol VTuber, Hoshimachi Suisei here!

subtitles.original: すいちゃんはー！
subtitles.english: Sui-chan is!

subtitles.original: 今日も可愛い！
subtitles.english: Cute again today!

subtitles.original: 革命の準備終わらせすぎ
subtitles.english: Over-prepared for the revolution

subtitles.original: 乗り込める希望はラージサイズ級
subtitles.english: The hope I can board is large-sized

subtitles.original: シュビドゥビドゥビドゥバ
subtitles.english: Shubidubidubiduba

subtitles.original: お前ら叫べタッチアンドゴー！
subtitles.english: You guys shout, touch and go!

subtitles.original: ゼロとイチの間に
subtitles.english: Between zeros and ones

subtitles.original: 白く吐き出した
subtitles.english: Breathed out in white

subtitles.original: In case I don't see you
subtitles.english: In case I don't see you

subtitles.original: ありゃりゃなんだこれこれどっか見た風景
subtitles.english: Ara-ra, what's this? A landscape I've seen somewhere

subtitles.original: またお色直しが美しく絶好調
subtitles.english: Another costume change, beautiful and in peak condition

subtitles.original: こんな場所で終わらせない準備はよう
subtitles.english: Ready not to let it end in a place like this

subtitles.original: 君も君も
subtitles.english: You too, and you too

subtitles.original: 濁ってる不感症も抱きしめてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll embrace even the clouded insensitivity

subtitles.original: 無知じゃないのだってあなたとほら
subtitles.english: I'm not ignorant, because look, with you

subtitles.original: トゥルルル...
subtitles.english: Turururu...

subtitles.original: 言葉が咲き出すただ欲しいと歌う
subtitles.english: Words begin to bloom, singing just that I want it

subtitles.original: 偶像じゃない
subtitles.english: Not an idol [statue]

subtitles.original: 人混みの中で全部愛と言い放とう
subtitles.english: Let's declare that everything is love in the crowd

subtitles.original: 喰らう、何万回と蘇生
subtitles.english: Chow down, revived tens of thousands of times

subtitles.original: 行けば救世
subtitles.english: If I go, it's salvation

subtitles.original: 挑むべき場所、意義、意味
subtitles.english: The place to challenge, significance, meaning

subtitles.original: ゾーン、ゾーン、皆探してる
subtitles.english: Zone, zone, everyone's searching

subtitles.original: 手のひらに答えがなくば
subtitles.english: If the answer isn't in the palm of your hand

subtitles.original: Vもリアルも関係ない
subtitles.english: V or real doesn't matter

subtitles.original: 旅立て空の向こうに！
subtitles.english: Set out to the other side of the sky!
